ClassDef.Name: PlayerDefaults

Properties.Name: MaxHealth
Properties.Description: The default maximum health of the player.

Properties.Name: WalkSpeed
Properties.Description: The default walking speed of the player.

Properties.Name: SprintSpeed
Properties.Description: The default sprinting speed of the player.

Properties.Name: JumpPower
Properties.Description: The default jump power of the player.

Properties.Name: RespawnTime
Properties.Description: The default time the player has to wait before respawning.

Properties.Name: ChatColor
Properties.Description: The default chat color of the player.

Properties.Name: CanMove
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player can move by default.

Properties.Name: StaminaBurn
Properties.Description: The rate at which the player's stamina depletes while sprinting.

Properties.Name: UseStamina
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player uses stamina.

Properties.Name: Stamina
Properties.Description: Determines the default stamina of players.

Properties.Name: MaxStamina
Properties.Description: Determines the default maximum stamina of players.

Properties.Name: StaminaRegen
Properties.Description: Determines the rate at which the player's stamina regenerates.

Properties.Name: UseHeadTurning
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player uses head turning by default.

Properties.Name: UseBubbleChat
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player uses bubble chat by default.

Properties.Name: AutoLoadAppearance
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player's appearance is automatically loaded by default.

Methods.Name: LoadDefaults
Methods.Description: Resets the specified player back to their default values.

ClassDef.Description: PlayerDefaults is a service used for storing the default values of the Player when created.
